mapper.insert: INSERT INTO DEPT (DEPTNO, DNAME, LOC) VALUES (#{deptNo}, #{name}, #{location})
UPDATE DEPT SET DNAME = #{name}, LOC = #{location} WHERE DEPTNO = #{deptNo}
mapper.select: SELECT D.DEPTNO, D.DNAME, D.LOC, E.EMPNO AS EMP_EMPNO, E.ENAME AS EMP_ENAME, E.JOB AS EMP_JOB, E.MGR AS EMP_MGR, E.HIREDATE AS EMP_HIREDATE, E.SAL AS EMP_SAL, E.COMM AS EMP_COMM FROM DEPT D LEFT OUTER JOIN EMP E ON D.DEPTNO = E.DEPTNO
